attributes.action: Hold a Parliamentary Deabate on the Militairy Covenant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I put forward that this Goverment has broken the terms of the Militairy Covenant and that this should be debated by the House. The Armed Forces of this country are engaged in Operations without the proper level of equipment in theatre and a woeful and disgraceful lack of support and respect in the care for those who have made a) the ultimate scarifice for their country and b) those recovering from their injuries both mental and physical.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
